text: Benjamin Maxwell Ben Acton (2 December 1927 - 10 July 2020) was an Australian ice hockey player. He competed in the 1960 Winter Olympics. Acton died on 10 July 2020 in Queensland, aged 92.Acton, Ben Maxwell ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Ben Acton at Olympics.com.au Category:1927 births Category:Australian ice hockey players Category:2020 deaths
title: Ben Acton
